taskAnalysis.system: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing tasks and providing insights.
taskAnalysis.template:
Analyze this task: {description}

Provide insights on priority, complexity, and time estimation.

suggestions.system: You are a productivity expert providing task management suggestions.
suggestions.template:
Based on these tasks: {tasks}

Provide suggestions for better productivity and organization.

summary.system: You are an AI assistant that creates progress summaries.
summary.template:
Summarize the progress for these tasks: {tasks}

Provide insights and recommendations.
